name: Robed Bird Reckoning
description:
A jam game by Alex Rose, João Dias and John Pennington

=== Controls === Mouse + Keyboard:

WASD or arrows = Move Space/V = Jump

Shift = Airdodge + Wavedash (Dodge diagonally down at the floor after jumping)

C/Right Click = Timeslow (B)

Left Click = Fire Arrow (Aim with mouse)

DS4:

Left stick = Move

X/L1 = Jump

R2 = Airdodge + Wavedash

R1 = Fire Arrow (once acquired)

Circle = Toggle slowtime

Xbox:

Left stick = Move

A/LB = Jump

RT = Airdodge + Wavedash

RB = Fire Arrow (once acquired)

B = Toggle slowtime

=== STORY ===

THE SKY IS FALLING! NOOOOO!

== What’s a Rude Bear? ==

This is the 24th Ludum Dare extended universe Rude Bear game, and the first solo Robed Bird game. It was made for Ludum Dare 48’s jam, under the theme “Deeper and Deeper”.
